sense.gloss: again, once more, once again, another time, some other time
and, in addition, besides, moreover, furthermore
once again, yet again, (there you go) again
like dew or lightning, gone in a flash

k_ele.e: 心頭を滅却すれば火もまた涼し
心頭を滅却すれば火も亦涼し

r_ele.r: しんとうをめっきゃくすればひもまたすずし

sense.gloss: if you clear your mind of all worldly thoughts, even fire will feel cool
